name: The Lone Chameleon
description:
The Lone Chameleon is a 2D puzzle-game.
You control 4 characters with unique abilities and make them work together to solve challenging puzzles.
Jump, avoid paralyzing rays and use moving pillars wisely to escape these rooms where every steps count.
New mechanics are introduced regulary throughout the 60 levels of the game.
Small scenes here and there will depict a discrete yet touching narrative.
